title: Captain Tsubasa - 25th Anniversary
description: Captain Tsubasa 25th Anniversary (キャプテン翼 25th ANNIVERSARY), also known by fans as Captain Tsubasa: All-star Game, is a five-part short story released in commemoration of, as the name indicates, the 25th anniversary of the Captain Tsubasa series, which started with an oneshot in 1980. It is not part of the canon of the regular series.
